venue.name: The Landsdowne Pub - the big Snugg Room

item.description:
In our last meetup we had a lot of requests for more focused and specific topics. One such topic was Facebook Fanpages. In this meetup we will dive into the specific tactics you can use to create a Successful Facebook fanpage that increases your website traffic, builds your email list, and creates new sales opportunities for your business. Email me with any questions or examples of excellent fanpages.

This is a new location for us and hopefully a permanent one if it works out.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Meetup in the big Snugg

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Secrets to a Successful Facebook Fanpage that Sells
